name: lambda-angular-universal
description: Template for creating Angular 5 universal apps atop Lambda

scripts.build-full: npm run build-client-and-server-bundles && npm run webpack-server && cp src/run-sample-event.js dist && cp src/sample-api-gateway-event.json dist
scripts.build-lambda: npm run build-client-and-server-bundles && npm run webpack-server && cd dist && cp ../package.json . && npm install --production && rm package.json && cd ..
scripts.build-client-and-server-bundles: ng build --prod && ng run lambda-angular-universal:server --output-hashing none
scripts.package: source .env && npm run clean && npm run build-lambda && npm run fix-bad-uglify-dates && aws cloudformation package --template ./cloudformation.yaml --s3-bucket $LAU_S3_BUCKET --output-template packaged-sam.yaml --region $LAU_AWS_REGION
scripts.deploy: source .env && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --stack-name $LAU_STACK_NAME --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $LAU_AWS_REGION
scripts.package-deploy: source .env && npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.setup: source .env && npm install && (aws s3 get-bucket-location --bucket $LAU_S3_BUCKET --region $LAU_AWS_REGION || npm run create-bucket) && npm run package-deploy

author: Christopher Weiss <bitblit@gmail.com>
